H0.text: in which regions are most of africa petroleum and natural gas found. Angola

H1.text: in which regions are most of africa petroleum and natural gas found. Algeria

H2.text: in which regions are most of africa petroleum and natural gas found. Libya

H3.text: in which regions are most of africa petroleum and natural gas found. Nigeria

A4.text: Cabinda's petroleum production from its considerable offshore reserves now accounts for more than half of Angola's output.

A5.text: Most of the oil along its coast was discovered under Portuguese rule by the Cabinda Gulf Oil Company (CABGOC) from 1968 onwards.
